system.effect: As a Full Action, character can inflict a suitable punishment on their own body (self mutilation, whipping, etc), suffering 1d5-2 Fatigue (min 1). For 1 Hour, or until the end of the current encounter, they gain +10 to Willpower Tests to Resist Fear, Pinning or Psychic Powers, as well as resisting Corruption. If Character possesses the Frenzy Talent, they can enter the Frenzied State as a Free Action whilst under the effects of this talent.
